description:
His next step in the protection of his beloved home is to target the Aunt. She must be dealt with if the home is to be guarded.
Using toys and devices to drown her in pleasure and slowly breaking her mind until he has complete control is the obvious choice!
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: A Huge-breasted Widow Aunt: Shiho - Reinvigorating Lust
Shiho, tante à forte poitrine et au désir ravivé
爆乳未亡人叔母・志保 ~蘇える淫欲~
